steps.content: What are the latest advances in renewable energy technology?
Creating initial plan: 1) Interpret query. 2) Decompose into research tasks. 3) Assign to appropriate agents.
Decomposing task into sub-tasks: research solar, wind, and battery storage advancements.
Assigning solar technology research to deep researcher agent.
Conducting deep research on recent solar technology advancements.
Solar advances: New photovoltaic materials increasing efficiency.
Marking solar research task as complete.
Assigning wind technology research to deep researcher agent.
Conducting deep research on recent wind technology advancements.
Wind advances: Turbine efficiency improvements and offshore developments.
Marking wind research task as complete.
Assigning battery storage technology research to deep researcher agent.
Conducting deep research on battery storage advancements.
Battery storage advances: New materials and technologies for higher capacity.
Marking battery storage research task as complete.
Analyzing all research findings to compile comprehensive report.
Compiling final report: Detailed information on solar, wind, and battery storage advancements.
